issue.title: [CF 269] Tooltip Scan result print on the icon
issue.body:
I'd like to be able to print the result of the tooltip scan on the icon and maybe be able to use that as condition for the icon visibility rules.
Examples of use:
Track the amount of damage absorbed by the paladin's mastery illuminated healing's shield.
Track how much health is stored in the Scales Of life trinket.
Track how much mana is stored in the Tyrande's Favorite Doll.


> Posted by CurseForge user sacrilego | Imported from CurseForge issue #269 | Raw
